title: The Reality of Being a Christian in the Public Eye ft. JD Rodgers
description:
Another Tuesday, another podcast episode!

 For today's episode, we have JD Rodgers, also known as a preacher at The Porch, to talk about the experience of being a Christian in the public. We will touch on expectations, influences, judgment, and more.   

Follow us on Instagram!  

Happy and Healthy: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/

JD: https://www.instagram.com/jd_rodgers/

Jeanine: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/ 


WATCH this episode: https://youtu.be/XzrrHgNcivE


You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/support
